alert.note: Alert for Carver; McLeod (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 5:56PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern McLeod and northwestern Carver Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 555 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Glencoe, or 16 miles southeast of Hutchinson, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Lester Prairie around 615 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Winsted, Mayer and Watertown. This includes U.S. Highway 212 between mile markers 118 and 126. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
